documents.document: Recently this song has been in my heart and mind like a broken record. It fills me with so much gratitude that my God loves me no matter what I have done or what I might do. The truths sung in this song are undeniable: Our God does not Change (James 1:17 also speaks of […]

Origin This essay is an organization of my thoughts, ideas, and feelings. Writing, along with any of the fine arts, is for me the best way to organize all that goes on in my head and capture it before it gets lost and thought of again by someone else. So let’s begin. Where did we […]

So, I’ve been asking the Lord to open up new ways to share the Gospel and reach people, not only unbelievers, but Christians also. I’ve decided to add a visual component to this written blog that highlights specific topics that God has laid on my heart. Under the video is the outline of the video: […]

Holiness 1 Peter 1:16 because it is written, “YOU SHALL BE HOLY, FOR I AM HOLY.” What is Holiness? Merriam Webster defines holiness as “the quality or state of being holy.” So what does it mean to be holy, and when have I achieved it? Again, Merriam Webster defines ‘holy’ as “exalted or worthy of […]

I had written this blog two weeks ago but have had so many issues with the video that I decided to post the outline. This week’s blog is in the works. Introduction: Hello! I hope that you have all had a great week. I am trying my best to shorten these videos, so I will […]

Well it’s been way too long since my last post, and I apologize! Life has been hectic and it seems that there is not enough time in a day! I constantly have to reconsider my priorities. God has been at work in my life! One thing that God has specifically revealed to me with such […]

Well, 2012 has come and is soon to leave bringing upon its exit 2013. I am thankful for 2012. It has not been the easiest year for me as it introduced into my life many difficult struggles, including some that may carry over into 2013. However, 2012 gave me some introductory lessons on how to […]

There is something soothing about the stillness of night.   The quiet, the emptiness, the listening.   Shadows are stretched, distorted and overlapped. Because night is polarizing – the darkness is deeper and the lights, brighter.   Ever notice how the deepest darks of night, vast and unknown stand defenseless before the faintest light breaking […]
